titles: A treatise of vsurie diuided into three bookes: the first defineth what is vsurie. The second determineth that to be vnlawfull. The third remoueth such motiues as perswade men in this age that it may be lawfull. By Robert Fenton Bachelar of Diuinitie.
author: Fenton, Roger, 1565-1616.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for VVilliam Aspley,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Usury --  Religious aspects --  Early works to 1800.
